creator: Curam Care
descriptionHtml:
At Curam we do things differently. Our platform was founded on the idea of building a fairer care community for all. A community which respects the value of care. One where clients have choice and control and carers have the ability to earn on average £15 per hour. Where carers are respected and rewarded for the great work they do.

Choice:
Choose the right client or clients for you, from the hundreds of new clients signing up to Curam every week across the UK. Both private clients and increasingly local councils, care homes, NHS Trusts and direct payment card holders. We advertise your profile for free.

Cost:
There are no joining or subscription fees. You agree an hourly or daily rate with your client and our fees come out of this rate. Carers typically take home less than 50% of what a client pays a traditional agency. As a self-employed carer on the Curam platform you receive 87.5% of what the client pays. Carers are averaging £15 per hour or over £100 per day on Curam.

Confidence:
With Curam as long as you transact properly through the platform all payments are secure and guaranteed.

Support:
Consistency in care is at the heart of Curam’s philosophy, so we have created a ‘micro-team’ system to support both carer and client when extra cover is needed. The team at Curam is also
here to support our fantastic carers whether via training courses through the platform or general support in helping to manage your clients.

Security
All the carers who transact through the Curam platform are automatically insured by Curam for free.


By downloading the Curam Carer App you can apply for jobs near you and get immediate notification of new jobs posted. Plus instant messaging with clients and or their families. Future
updates will include a carer review section and a care plan you can easily adapt for your individual clients. Alongside updated information with regards to the care sector as a whole and much much more.
descriptionShort: Our platform was founded on the idea of building a fairer care community for all

Cost:
There are no joining or subscription fees. You agree an hourly or daily rate with your client and our fees come out of this rate. Carers typically take home less than 50% of what a client pays a traditional agency. As a self-employed carer on the Curam platform you receive 85% of what the client pays. At Curam we do things differently. Our platform was founded on the idea of building a fairer care community for all. A community which respects the value of care. One where clients have choice and control and carers have the ability to earn on average £15 per hour. Where carers are respected and rewarded for the great work they do.

Confidence:
With Curam as long as you transact properly through the platform all payments are secure and guaranteed.
 
Support:
Carers are the bedrock of the sector and Curam’s philosophy is to support them wherever we can. We encourage micro-teams for support of both the carer and their client. We have launched a range of benefits including shopping discounts, holiday and sick pay insurance and more. We will soon be launching a safety app. There are 12 free online training courses available to all approved carers. title: Curam for carers

creator: Curamcare Ltd
descriptionHtml:
At Curam we do things differently. Our platform was founded on the idea of building a fairer care community for all. A community which respects the value of care. One where clients have choice and control and carers have the ability to earn on average £15 per hour. Where carers are respected and rewarded for the great work they do.
 
Choice:
Choose the right client or clients for you, from the hundreds of new clients signing up to Curam every week across the UK. Both private clients and increasingly local councils, care homes, NHS Trusts and direct payment card holders. We advertise your profile for free.
 
Cost:
There are no joining or subscription fees. You agree an hourly or daily rate with your client and our fees come out of this rate. Carers typically take home less than 50% of what a client pays a traditional agency. As a self-employed carer on the Curam platform you receive 85% of what the client pays. Carers are averaging £15 per hour or over £100 per day for live-in care on Curam.
 
Confidence:
With Curam as long as you transact properly through the platform all payments are secure and guaranteed.
 
Support:
Carers are the bedrock of the sector and Curam’s philosophy is to support them wherever we can. We encourage micro-teams for support of both the carer and their client. We have launched a range of benefits including shopping discounts, holiday and sick pay insurance and more. We will soon be launching a safety app. There are 12 free online training courses available to all approved carers. The team at Curam is also here to support our fantastic carers in using the platform and getting the best out of it.
 
Security
All the carers who transact through the Curam platform are automatically insured by Curam for free.
 
By downloading the Curam Carer App you can apply for jobs near you and get immediate notification of new jobs posted. Plus instant messaging with clients and or their families.

title: Curam for carers

creator: Curamcare Ltd
descriptionHtml:
At Curam we do things differently, we are a community that respects the value of care, where clients have choice and control, and carers can set their own rates and hours and are rewarded and respected for the work that they do.  

Choice 

Choose the hours you work and the right clients for you from the hundreds of new clients that are signing up to Curam each week all over the UK. Clients on Curam include private clients, local councils, care homes, NHS trusts and direct payment card holders.  

Cost  

We advertise your profile for free, there are no joining or subscription fees. You agree your rate with your client and our fees come out of this rate. As a self-employed carer on the Curam platform you received 85% of what your client pays. Carers on Curam are earning on average £16 per hour and over £950 a week for live-in care. 

Support 

Curam’s philosophy is to support carers wherever we can. We provide all approved carers with online training, NACAS membership and self-employed carer’s insurance providing they transact via the platform, and we encourage micro-teams for support of both the carer and their client. The team at Curam is also here to support our fantastic carers in using the platform and getting the best out of it. 

Security 

Curam have an in-built safety feature on the app which allows carers to add up to 5 trusted contacts. If activated in an emergency the carer’s trusted contacts are notified of their GPS location at the touch of a button. 
 
By downloading the Curam carer app you can sign up, complete your profile and become approved. You can then apply for jobs near you and get immediately notified of jobs posted near you. We look forward to welcoming you to our carer community
descriptionShort: Our platform was founded on the idea of building a better care community for all

We provide all approved carers with online training, NACAS membership and self-employed carer’s insurance providing they transact via the platform, and we encourage micro-teams for support of both the carer and their client. The team at Curam is also here to support our fantastic carers in using the platform and getting the best out of it. 

Security 

Curam have an in-built safety feature on the app which allows carers to add up to 5 trusted contacts. If activated in an emergency the carer’s trusted contacts are notified of their GPS location at the touch of a button. 
 
By downloading the Curam carer app you can sign up, complete your profile and become approved. You can then apply for jobs near you and get immediately notified of jobs posted near you. We look forward to welcoming you to our carer community
descriptionShort: Our platform was founded on the idea of building a better care community for all

Choose the hours you work and the right clients for you from the hundreds of new clients that are signing up to Curam each week all over the UK. Clients on Curam include private clients, local councils, care homes, NHS trusts and direct payment card holders.  

Cost  

We advertise your profile for free, there are no joining or subscription fees. You agree your rate with your client and our fees come out of this rate. As a self-employed carer on the Curam platform you received 85% of what your client pays. Carers on Curam are earning on average £16 per hour and over £950 a week for live-in care. 

Support 

Curam’s philosophy is to support carers wherever we can. We provide all approved carers with online training, NACAS membership and self-employed carer’s insurance providing they transact via the platform, and we encourage micro-teams for support of both the carer and their client. The team at Curam is also here to support our fantastic carers in using the platform and getting the best out of it. 

Security 

Curam have an in-built safety feature on the app which allows carers to add up to 5 trusted contacts. If activated in an emergency the carer’s trusted contacts are notified of their GPS location at the touch of a button. 
 
By downloading the Curam carer app you can sign up, complete your profile and become approved. You can then apply for jobs near you and get immediately notified of jobs posted near you. We look forward to welcoming you to our carer community
descriptionShort: Our platform was founded on the idea of building a better care community for all
